name: Disaster Dragon x Girls from Different Worlds
name_original: Disaster Dragon x Girls from Different Worlds
description:
Story
A dragon, which would destroy the world, is now about to wake up.
The Disaster Dragon, you must slay it to save the world.
You are summoned to this world and become a dragon slayer with romance and dream.
There are other adventures from other worlds come to this land just like you.
The unknown world is waiting for you.
Control
L-Click: Confirm
R-Click: Cancel
Drag: Move the map in dungeon, change character position in list
Content
Dungeon Conquering SRPG
Meet new partners in the adventure and build your own team to challenge the boss.
Besides the heroines, there are many other characters that would join your team.
Take good use of your resource, including the time.
You would get a new-game-bonus after you clear this game once.
Special Guest
There would be a few old friends from other Alibi game.
You would see 3 main characters from ‘My Church’, Liz from ‘Lilit H Project’ and Randy from ‘Blade of Glory - Golden Lion -’.
